column1: Issues and fixes on home moinitor

column2: shannstainable.fewings.org. Bad Gateway 502 after restarting Rasp Pi
column3: Checked shannstainable.fewings.org/grafana worked ok. 192.168.1.111:1880/ui worked ok. Restarted nodered (sudo systemctl restart nodered.service)=> no fix. Solution restart nginx (sudo systemctl restart nginx)

column2: To view logs from journalctrl use journalctl -f | grep "temp1
